name: avetis

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=true npm install --prefix avetis && npm run build --prefix avetis

keywords: Give a gift get a smile
author: Gor Baghramyan <gorbaghramyan@outlook.com>, Arman Sargsyan
